1.1.name: wordpress/minibul-for-wordpress
1.1.description:
Minibul for WordPress displays a Widget that shows the latest message from any public Minibul in any Minibul Community. If you are looking for a widget that shows latest updates in Minibul Discussions, use the minibul-discussions-for-wordpress plugin. Features

*  Simply
*  Customizable
*  Widget support
*  No options page (yes, its a feature)
*  Uses Wordpress resources (no extra files needed)

Usage

If you use WordPress widgets, just drag the widget into your sidebar and configure. Be sure to have activated the plugin in your Plugin Settings.
